crew.title: Crew Members
crew.description: Manage your crew member roster and onboarding status

quizReviews.title: Pending Quiz Reviews
quizReviews.description: Review and approve quiz submissions from crew members
quizReviews.emptyDescription: All quiz submissions have been reviewed.

onboardingReviews.title: Complete Onboarding Reviews
onboardingReviews.description: Review complete training progress and approve final onboarding
onboardingReviews.emptyDescription: No crew members ready for final onboarding approval.

tooltips.viewCrewMember: View detailed crew member information, training progress, and completion status
tooltips.sendMagicLink: Send a secure login link to crew member's email for training access (3-hour expiration)
tooltips.sendSafetyPDF: Send the complete Safety Management System (SMS) PDF document to crew member
tooltips.sendOnboardingStart: Send welcome email to officially start the crew member's onboarding training process
tooltips.resendCompletionEmail: Resend completion certificate and congratulations email to fully trained crew member
tooltips.editCrewMember: Edit crew member details, position, vessel assignment, and other profile information
tooltips.deleteCrewMember: Permanently remove this crew member from the system (cannot be undone)

messages.onboardingEmailFailed: Failed to send Onboarding Start email: {{error}}
messages.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}? This action cannot be undone.
messages.bulkDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} crew member(s)? This action cannot be undone.
messages.approveOnboardingConfirm: Are you sure you want to approve this crew member's complete onboarding? This will generate and send their completion certificate.
